title: Update Café 37 title/tagline and business hours schedule

requirements.text: Update the site branding title to show the main title text as "CAFE 37" and the tagline/subtitle text as "The ultimate hangout cafe" wherever the café name/tagline is displayed (e.g., Home hero, header/footer brand block, share text, and any tagline component).

quotes:
And write as a title 
CAFE 37 
The ultimate hangout cafe

acceptanceCriteria: Home page hero heading displays exactly "CAFE 37" and the subtitle/tagline displays exactly "The ultimate hangout cafe".
Header brand text displays "CAFE 37" as the visible café name.
Footer brand block displays "CAFE 37" and "The ultimate hangout cafe".
Any dedicated tagline component no longer shows the old tagline and instead displays "The ultimate hangout cafe" (or reads it from the shared content source).

requirements.text: Update the displayed business hours to match the provided weekly schedule: Friday–Sunday 12 pm–12 am; Monday–Thursday 1 pm–12 am. Ensure this schedule is shown on the Contact page and anywhere else the site currently displays hours/closing time (e.g., footer and Home hero “Closes at” line).

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page “Hours” section displays the full weekly schedule with the exact times provided for each day.
Footer hours/open info reflects the new schedule (no longer only “Closes at 12:00 AM” unless additionally shown alongside the schedule).
Home page hours/open status line reflects the new hours (e.g., shows today’s open/close window or otherwise clearly matches the new schedule).
All displayed times use the same formatting as provided (12 pm–12 am; 1 pm–12 am).

requirements.text: Update site-level HTML metadata title/description (frontend/index.html) to reflect the updated branding "CAFE 37" and the new tagline "The ultimate hangout cafe" (user-facing SEO strings should be consistent with the updated title/tagline).

quotes:
And write as a title 
CAFE 37 
The ultimate hangout cafe

acceptanceCriteria: Meta description and Open Graph title/description no longer reference the old primary name/tagline and instead reflect "CAFE 37" and/or "The ultimate hangout cafe" consistently.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only UI components).
Do not edit the immutable authentication/actor hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: No changes to menu/catalog/admin functionality beyond updating displayed branding text and hours content.
